<h1 align="center">
<img src="./assets/icon.png" alt="CobbleGen" width="150"/><br/>
CobbleGen
</h1>

<p align="center">A fabric/quilt mod that allows you to customize/randomize cobblestone (basalt and stone) generator.</p>

<p align="center">
<a href="https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/cobblegen"><img src="https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/581293.svg" alt="CurseForge"/></a>
<a href="https://modrinth.com/mod/cobblegen"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&label=&suffix=%20&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/qRogT5Gy&style=flat&color=242629&labelColor=5ca424" alt="Modrinth"></a>
</p>
